snippet: A coal mine explosion in eastern China has killed at least 14 people just days after a blast in the country’s southwest left 44 dead.
abstract: Coal mine explosion in eastern China kills at least 14 people just days after a blast in the country’s southwest left 44 dead.
lead_paragraph: A coal mine explosion in eastern China has killed at least 14 people just days after a blast in the country’s southwest left 44 dead.

headline.seo: Deadly Blast at Coal Mine in China
headline.main: China: Deadly Blast at Coal Mine
